game.beginning: In a post-apocalyptic world where technology has been left to ruin, humanity is on the brink of extinction.
game.ending: The player's character has uncovered the source of the apocalypse and must make a choice to either destroy it or use its power for their own gain.
game.synopsis: After waking up in an abandoned research facility with no memory of who they are or how they got there, the player's character soon discovers that they have unique abilities that set them apart from the rest of humanity. As they navigate through the ruins of civilization, they begin to uncover a sinister plot that led to the downfall of society. Along the way, they must make difficult choices and form alliances with other survivors who may or may not have ulterior motives.
game.title: Rebirth
